name: close-combat
effect: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Defense and Special Defense by one stage each.
short_effect: Lowers the user’s Defense and Special Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. This also lowers the user’s Defense and Sp. Def stats.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user fights the target up close, inflicting damage without guarding itself. This also lowers the user's defensive stats.
